name: Natalia Mccann
text: Fine place for quality Pizza. Looking forward to coming back with my relatives. The bill was fair I would say.

name: praveen arogyaraj
text: Best pizza in Cincinnati

name: Adam A
text: Went for the buffet. It was good, but if you don't do meat, you may need to special order something because they don't put out a lot of non-meat options, if any. Also go early because it can get very crowded and cramped the closer to 12pm you get.

name: Robbie E
text: VERY tiny, but the all you can eat lunch buffet is the best deal in the city. The pizza on the buffet is perfectly fine, especially for the money. If you want a pie with a little better quality though, I suggest ordering carry out.

name: Adonis Hewari
text: Cheap lunch buffet. $6 for all you can eat including drink. Great value

name: Nathan Neitman
text: Decent pizza that is super fast to come out, staff was nice too. It's a great place for a fast lunch.

name: Nick Mayer
text: Extremely fast, cheap, and delicious. Couldn't ask for anything better in downtown. Under 7 bucks gets you a drink, all you can eat salad, and all you can eat pizza.

name: Sachin M
text: Nice buffet for the price (6.99) - you get a drink and a choice of 5 pizza and salad (more options if you order from the menu instead of buffet). Plenty of seating to accommodate the weekday lunch crowds. …More

name: TR Precht
text: Amazing lunch buffet.   Always crowded, but that's only because it is so good.   They have some of the best desert pizzas I've ever seen.  I also really enjoy the ultra rare chili pizza.

name: Cheryl Ernst
text: Great price for pizza buffet with an assortment of pizza, salad and drink for $6.75.

name: Alex Gose
text: Good pizza especially when fresh and you can't beat the all you can eat buffet especially downtown when it comes to price. Pizza, salad, and a drink all unlimited for like $7.

name: Tails to Scales
text: I just ordered from there and they told me it would take about 45 minutes after the 45 minutes is up they gave me a call to let me know that they were on the way . They also originally forgot to put the ranch packet in there but the guy …More

name: Dustin Perkins
text: Love the pizza here love the prices for a bafet

name: L Blaine
text: Nice pizza place in the central business district of Cincinnati

name: Willie Maekit
text: We often have this Snappy cater pizza for office parties.  Really good for production pizza.  As others note, the sauce is very good.

name: Ed Saffle
text: Closed!  I hadn't been by there in three or four weeks and decided to go today. There's a sign on the door stating that this location is now closed. :-(

name: larks tongue
text:
so many people at lunch time and only 4 reviews? come on, really nice pizza on great value
nobody in downtown can beat their buffet

name: Junk Box
text:
Like Dining in a Clown Car
they cram about 50 people in an area for about 20, seriously??...are the owners serious?...can you say fire code? …More

name: Connor Click
text: Best snappy tomato pizza you can get!

name: satya T
text: A good quality at decent price..

name: Eric Rothweiler
text: Great value on the lunch buffet

name: Sharat Sharma
text: Great Pizza's for a very reasonable price. Specially the pineapple ones.

name: Kevin Weartz
text: Best value downtown for lunch

name: Ethan Chambers
text: All I got was flat bread but it's mean.

name: Buford Harvey
text: Great value for the price

name: Dru Smith
text: Great deal, but pizza crust wasn't that great.

name: Craig Everman
text: For all you can eat buffet with drink for under $7, it's hard to say no. Can get a bit crowded on some weekdays for lunch.

name: Jeff
text: Cheap lunch for being in the city, but the pizza is just a grade above bar pizza

name: Que Johnson
text: Ready to try cicadas

name: Manmohan Sharma
text: need more seating

name: Will O'Meara
text: I like their pizza a lot, just wish this location was open on weekends and evenings.

name: Swathi Reddy
text: Worst experience ever. Will never go that place again. It's suppose to be Pizza Buffet but, if you are planning to go after 1:00pm be prepared to have nothing.

name: D G
text: grease magnet
